contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Trois-Ponts |picture= |picture-legend= |map=Trois-Ponts Liège Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Trois-Ponts in the province of Liège |arms= |flag= |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LG}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Verviers|Verviers]] |nis=63086 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Jean-Luc GABRIEL (Mr) |majority= |postal-codes=4980, 4983 |telephone-area=080 |web=[http://www.troisponts.be/ www.troisponts.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=22 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=52 }} [[File:Trois Ponts, straatzicht foto5 2012-06-29 10.57.JPG|Trois Ponts, view to a street|thumb|200px|left]] '''Trois-Ponts''' is a [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]]. It lies in the country's [[Wallonia|Walloon Region]] and [[Liege (province)|Province of Liege]]. On January 1, 2006 Trois-Ponts had a total population of 2,445. The total area is 68.90 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 35 inhabitants per km². It is situated at the confluence of the rivers [[Amblève (river)|Amblève]] and [[Salm River (Belgium)|Salm]]. ==References== {{reflist}} {{Liege municipalities}} [[Category:Municipalities of Liège (province)]] {{Liege-geo-stub}}
